pattpack.image
Class GifReader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pattpack.image.GifReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageReader
public class GifReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageReader

Implementation of an image reader for images in gif format. It does not need to be public. It is public to ease the documentation.
